He worked at Sir Salimullah Medical College and Mitford Hospital, Dhaka Medical College Hospital, ICDDRB and Asgar Ali Hospital. At Square, he joined as a Senior Consultant, Interventional Cardiology.

name: Brig Gen Prof. Dr. Md Abdul Bari Mollick
educationalDegree: BDS, FCPS (Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopedics) Fellow, All India Institute of Medical Science (AIIMS)
description:
Brig Gen Prof. Dr. Md Abdul Bari Mollick after graduating (BDS) Â from Dhaka Dental College, has more than 33 years of experience in dentistry. He has been working as a Consultant Â Dental Surgeon General, Directorate General of Medical Services (DGMS), Bangladesh Armed Forces, Ministry of Defence.

He completed comprehensive trainings on Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery from Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU) and his grading course from Armed Forces Institute of Medical Sciences, Bangladesh. His dedication to dentistry secured him possessing the FCPS degree on Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopedics from Bangladesh College of Physician and Surgeon (BCPS).

He is a fellow of All India Institute of Medical Science (AIIMS) and obtained PGT in Laser Dentistry and Dental Implant from New Delhi India. He served in different Combined Military Hospitals (CMH) of Bangladesh Army. He also served in Kuwait Armed Forces Hospital and also in UN Hospital Liberia.Â 

Dr. Mollick has a long term hand in Orthodontics and Dentofacial Deformities. He is the founder life member of South Asian Association of Paediatric Dentistry (SAAPD) and also a member of BDS, BOS, IADT & IADR. He actively participated in various National & International Dental Seminars and Â  workshops both in home and abroad.

At Square Hospital, he joined as a Consultant, Dental Surgery and Orthodontics.

name: Dr. Raziuddin Ahmed
specialty: Associate Consultant, Internal Medicine & Critical care
description:
Dr. Raziuddin Ahmed graduated from Sir Salimullah Medical College (SSMC). After his internship in Mitford Hospital, he joined King Salman Hospital, one of the largest and advanced hospitals under MOH (Ministry Of Health) in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. He achieved an opportunity to develop himself professionally by enrolling into Saudi Board of Residency in Internal Medicine. He completed his post-graduation in Internal Medicine MRCP from Royal College of Physicians, Uk. He also obtained Â EDIC (European diploma in intensive care medicine) under European Society of Intensive Care Medicine (ESICM). He is also a member of Royal College of Physicians Edinburgh.Â 

Dr. Raziuddin served in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia for 12 years in Internal Medicine and Intensive Care Unit (ICU) where he gathered appreciable experiences in managing critically afflicted patients.

During his professional services, he attained advanced training in internal medicine & Â critical care from UK and Belgium. In Â his illustrated career, he attended many courses and trainings for example ECMO in Singapore, Critical Care Ultrasound and ECHO in India, advanced training on mechanical ventilator and hemodynamics.

Currently, he is the co-ordinator and one of the officially approved instructors by SCCM (Society of Critical Care Medicine, US) of FCCS (Fundamentals Criticar Care Support) in Bangladesh.

Dr. Raziuddin Â is working in Square Hospital as an Associate Consultant in Internal & Critical Care Medicine.

name: Dr. Kamrunnaher Shultana
educationalDegree: MBBS, FCPS (Pediatrics) Fellow,  Pediatric Critical Care (CMC Vellore, India)
specialty: Associate Consultant, Pediatrics and Pediatric ICU
description:
Dr. Kamrunnaher Shultana, a medical graduate from Z. H. Sikder Medical College, embarked on a transformative journey in pediatric care. Following her MBBS, she dedicated four years to honing her expertise in child health across various academic hospitals. In 2015, she achieved the prestigious FCPS degree in Pediatrics from the Bangladesh College of Physicians & Surgeons (BCPS).

As a Pediatrician, Dr. Shultana garnered practical experience in pediatrics and its sub-specialties within distinguished tertiary and super-specialized hospitals in Bangladesh. Further enhancing her skills, she became a fellow in Pediatric Critical Care at CMC, Vellore, India, contributing not only as a clinical fellow but also actively engaging in impactful research focusing on the health of newborns, children, and adolescents.

Her dedication to advancing medical knowledge is evident through her authorship of numerous research articles published in renowned national and international journals.Â 

Â Dr. Kamrunnaher is working as an Associate Consultant in Pediatrics and Pediatric ICU at Square Hospital.

name: Prof. Dr. Saban Horo
educationalDegree: MBBS, MS (Ophthalmology) Fellow in Cataract & Microsurgery Fellow in Medical Retina & Surgical Retina
description:
Prof. Dr. Saban Horo, a medical graduate of Patna Medical College, Bihar, India boarded on a progressive journey in Ophthalmology patient care. He achieved his Masters in Ophthalmology (MS) from the same institution.

He joined the Ophthalmology Department of Christian Medical College, Vellore, India in 2002 and managed various ophthalmic emergencies like corneo-scleral tear and lid tear repair. During this period he gained experience in Nd-Yag lasers and double-frequency Yag lasers. He was a full-time Fellow (Basic & Advanced) in Cataract Microsurgery in Sankara Nethralaya, Chennai and exposed to photodynamic therapy and thermotherapy in treatment of various retinal diseases.

As an Assistant Professor of Christian Medical College, Vellore, he conducted retina clinics wherein retinal referrals were seen, lasers were done and decisions were taken. He was involved in screening of premature babies in the Neonatal unit. His surgical work in anterior segment surgeries included cataract surgeries with and without IOL implant and complicated cataract surgeries. He became an Associate Professor in 2010 and Â Professor in 2022.Â 

Prof. Dr. Saban Horo is competent in Cataract and Glaucoma diagnosis/work-up/surgery, ND-Yag Laser, Vitrectomy, Retinal Lasers Slit Lamp delivery, Corneo-scleral Tear repair and so others. He has many publications in national and international journals.Â 

He joined Square Hospital as a Senior Consultant, Ophthalmology.

name: Prof. Dr. Brig. Gen. (Retd.) Mozibul Haque
description:
Prof. (Brig. Gen.) Mozibul Haque (Retd) is a dedicated and accomplished Cardiac Anesthesiologist with extensive expertise in Anesthesiology and Critical Care Medicine, acquired both domestically and internationally. He graduated with an MBBS from Rajshahi Medical College in 1986 and subsequently joined the prestigious Army Medical Corps, where he completed specialized training in Emergency War Surgery (Biological & Nuclear Warfare) conducted by the U.S. Army Special Forces in Washington. Prof. Haque earned a Diploma in Anesthesiology (Graded Specialist) in 1993, followed by an FCPS in 1998. He obtained a fellowship in Cardiac Anesthesia at the Prince Sultan Cardiac Center (PSCC) in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia in 2001. To further his anesthesia expertise, he obtained a Diploma in Echocardiography in 2018 from the Medical University of Vienna, accredited by the European Society of Echocardiography.

Throughout his distinguished career, Brig. Gen. Haque has served as an Anesthesiologist and Intensivist at United Nations hospitals in the Democratic Republic of Congo and Ivory Coast. He has held prominent positions, including Head of the Department of Anesthesiology at the Armed Forces Medical College (AFMC) and Combined Military Hospital(CMH) in Dhaka. In addition to his remarkable professional accomplishment, he held the esteemed title of the President of the Technical Sub-Committee at the Sheikh Hasina National Institute of Burn and Plastic Surgery, Dhaka. Prof. Haque is a faculty member and examiner at several prestigious institutions, including the Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons (BCPS), Bangladesh University of Professionals (BUP), and Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU).

Prof. Haque has a particular interest in Transesophageal Echocardiography (TEE) and Point-of-Care Ultrasound (POCUS) in Anesthesia and Critical Care. His impressive breadth of expertise includes TEE, Regional Anesthesia, POCUS, and Cardiac Anesthesia. As an avid researcher, he has published more than 40 novel works, review articles, and case reports in various national and international medical journals.

name: Major Dr. Khandker Mahbub-Uz-Zaman
educationalDegree: MBBS, MD (Rheumatology), Clinical Fellowship in Rheumatology (Singapore)
description: Rheumatologist Maj. Dr. Khandker Mahbub-Uz-Zaman has the experience of treating rheumatic and musculoskeletal diseases. After completion of his MBBS from Chittagong Medical College, he went to Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU) to earn MD in Rheumatology. Later, he proceeded to Tan Tock Seng Hospital (TTSH), Singapore for his Clinical Fellowship in Rheumatology. He also attended multiple musculoskeletal ultrasonography courses at home and abroad. He is also trained in doing nailfold capillaroscopy. Â  Maj. Dr. Khandker Mahbub-Uz-Zaman is employed in Combined Military Hospital (CMH), Dhaka, working as Assistant Professor of Rheumatology. He is expert in managing autoimmune rheumatic diseases (eg SLE, Systemic Sclerosis, and myositis), arthritis (Rheumatoid arthritis, Spondyloarthritis, Psoriatic arthritis, Gout, and Septic arthritis), metabolic bone diseases (Osteoporosis, Osteomalacia, etc) and auto-inflammatory diseases.Under his credit, he has several research and publications.Â He joined Square Hospital as Associate Consultant, Rheumatology.

name: Dr. Istaque Ahmed Milton
description:
Dr. Istaque Ahmed Milton graduated from CBMC,B in 2005. He obtained Diploma in Anesthesiology (DA) from Dhaka Medical College in 2009 and Fellowship in Anesthesiology (FCPS) from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons in 2012. He attended many training programs, workshops, seminars and conferences in home and abroad. He is a life member of BSA-CCPP and BCPS. He is also a member of BMA and BSSP.

Dr. Istaque Ahmed Milton completed his training from BSMMU and Dhaka Medical College Hospital in Anesthesia, critical care and pain medicine. He started his professional career as a cardiac anesthesiologist in Ibrahim Cardiac Hospital and Research Institute. Then he served in Uttara Womenâs Medical College and eventually joined at Square Hospital in 2010. Since then, he has been serving in different level of responsibilities in the department of anesthesia. He is consulting patients as a Consultant of Pain Medicine at Square Hospital.

name: Dr. Nazia Farid
description: Dr. Nazia Farid graduated from Dhaka Medical College and later completed postgraduate training in Dhaka Medical College Hospital. She obtained FCPS in surgery from Bangladesh College of Physician and Surgeons (BCPS).Â She worked as registrar and specialist at reputed private hospitals and gained experience of performing elective and emergency surgery, pre and post operative patient care.Â Dr. Nazia Farid has also brief experience in working in plastic and pediatric surgery and is a life member of Society of Surgeons of Bangladesh.

name: Dr. Sarabon Tahura
educationalDegree: MBBS, FCPS (Pediatrics), FCCP (USA), Fellowship in Pediatric Bronchoscopy
description: Dr. Sarabon Tahura is a medical graduate (MBBS) from Mymensingh Medical College and obtained her FCPS (Pediatrics) from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeon (BCPS). Afterwards, she completed fellowship in Pediatric Bronchoscopy from Qilu Children Hospital under Shangdong University, China. She achieved fellowship âFCCPâ by American College of Chest Physicians, USA. She started her career in Dhaka Shishu Hospital (present name Bangladesh Shishu Hospital and Institute) in 2006. At present she is working as an Associate Professor of Pediatric Respiratory Medicine at the same institute. She has attained advanced training and hands on workshops and acquired significant experience in Pediatrics, Pediatric Respiratory Medicine and Pediatric Interventional Pulmonology. She is highly competent in managing different respiratory diseases in children including chronic cough, pneumonia, recurrent respiratory tract infections, bronchiolitis, bronchitis, broncheal asthma, allergy, tuberculosis, cystic fibrosis, bronchiectasis, immunodeficiency, ILD etc with updated knowledge and advanced latest technology.Â Dr. Sarabon Tahura is the 1st Pediatric Interventional Pulmonologist in Bangladesh, performing all basic & advanced bronchoscopic procedures in children and neonate. She has earned significant experience and expertise in pediatric bronchoscopy for foreign body removal from airway and other advanced interventions. In Bangladesh, she has pioneered several procedures in children including flexible bronchoscopy guided endobronchial tumor debulking, balloon bronchoplasty, endobronchial electro surgery, cryotherapy, APC.Â She is frequently invited as international faculty at conferences, meeting and bronchoscopy workshops in different countries across the world. She authored the book âPaediatric Bronchoscopy- learn the basicâ and several book chapters on pediatric bronchoscopy. A good number of articles have been published under her name in different national and international medical journals. She has been awarded in different international seminars.

name: Dr. Jasmin Manzoor
description:
â¢ She earned her Masters in Dermatological Science from Boston University (BU) School of Medicine, USA. During this time she was working at the BU Medical Center and the Veterans Administration Medical Center and Boston City Hospital under several world-renowned American Dermatologists.
Â 
â¢ After passing American Medical licensing Board she returned to Boston University School of Medicine to complete her post-doctoral clinical fellowship in advanced dermatology and wound healing.
Â 
â¢ She earned her Diploma in Dermatological Science from the University of Wales, College of Medicine in Cardiff, UK.
Â 
â¢ She worked extensively on cryopreserved skin graft in collaboration with Harvard Medical Center and BU Medical Center. With additional experience in the allograft, and research of the ageing process and anti-wrinkle medicine. She is an expert on dermatologic surgery, laser surgery, botox, fillers, micro needling, chemical peeling, PRP for hair loss and skin rejuvenation, electrosurgery, cryosurgery and skin biopsy. She specializes in treating Paediatric Dermatology. She treats a wide range of white skin problem, skin cancer with the facility of Dermoscopy. She is an expert on Venous stasis and chronic leg ulcers. She also treats sexually transmitted diseases.
Â 
â¢ Has treated 1 lac (more than) patients for the dermatological problem and performed over 60,000 dermatologic and laser surgeries.
Â 
â¢ Before she joined Evercare Hospital Dhaka, she was an Assistant Professor of Dermatology Dept at Bangladesh Medical College and Hospital.

name: Dr. Monowara Begum
educationalDegree:
MBBS, FCPS (BCPS), MS (Obs./Gynae.) 
Advanced Gynaecology Laparoscopic Surgeon 
Fellowship in Minimally Access Surgery on Gynae Oncology (India)
description:
Areas of expertise


Dr. Monowara Begum is a reputed Gynecologist and Obstetrician in the country with more than 30 years of experience in the field of Obstetrics and Gynaecology. 


She graduated from Rajshahi Medical College and served 20 years in Government Service in different hospitals throughout Dhaka. 


After graduation she underwent extensive training in Obstetrics and Gynaecology. She worked in Institute of Post-graduate Medicine and Research (IPGM&R) and in Sir Salimullah Medical College as Assistant Registrar and Resident Surgeon. 


She obtained FCPS from BCPS and later MS from University of Dhaka. Other than routine Obstetrics & Gynaecology work, she has wide experience in Advanced Laparoscopic and Endoscopic Surgery for Infertility and Gynaecology and has been trained in Kerala, Madras and Delhi of India.


She has performed over 1,500 total Laparoscopic Hysterectomy. 


She has completed her fellowship in Minimally Access Surgery on Gynae Oncology from Basavatarakam Indo-American Cancer Hospital & Research Center. 


Before Joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, she was working as Associate Professor and Head of the Department of Obstetrics & Gynaecology at Shahbuddin Medical College Hospital, Dhaka.

name: Dr. Shams Munwar
description: Dr. Shams Munwar graduated from Dhaka Medical College in 1985. After completing his internship, Dr. Munwar left for the United Kingdom for higher medical training. In the UK, Dr. Munwar worked in the National Health Service from 1988 to 1995. In 1992, Dr. Munwar obtained his membership from the Royal College of Physicians of UK (MRCP). He started his career in Cardiology from 1992. While doing his fellowship in 1995 under Professor Celia Oakley at the Hammersmith Hospital, London, Dr. Munwar obtained Diploma in Cardiology from the University of London. He did his Interventional Fellowship from Wentworth Hospital in Durban, under University of Natal in the Republic of South Africa. He obtained FRCP from London, UK in July, 2010. Dr. Shams Munwar has over 14 years experience in the field of Cardiology. Before joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, he was working as Head of the Department of Cardiology at Z.H. Sikder Women's Medical College.

name: Dr. A.Q.M. Reza
description:
Fellow Society for Cardiovascular Angiography and Intervention (USA), Fellow Asia Pacific Society of Interventional Cardiology (Singapore) 

Prof. Dr. A Q M Reza is renowned in Bangladesh for his expertise in Balloon Valvuloplasty especially Mitral stenosis (PTMC) & Peripheral angioplasty. He has an outstanding performance record in Coronary angioplasty including Primary PCI, Chronic Total Occlusion & multi vessel complex angioplasties for more than 20 years. 

He is a pioneer in This Hospital for structural heart disease treatment like ASD, VSD, PDA device closure, and also lifesaving IVC filter implantation and tumor vessel embolization. 

Prof. Reza obtained MBBS from Sir Salimullah Medical College Dhaka and earned his MD in Cardiology from National Institute of Cardiovascular Disease (NICVD), Dhaka. He received basic medical training from IPGM&R Dhaka. He got vast training in clinical & interventional cardiology at NICVD and personalized training at Mount Elizabeth Hospital, Singapore, Madras Medical Mission, Chennai India, South Korea, Japan. He received specialized training on permanent Pacemaker, ICD and CRT implantation from Germany and Baroda, India. 

He is a life member of Bangladesh Cardiac Society and Founder life member of Bangladesh Society of Interventional Cardiology, Bangladesh Society of Echocardiography, International Society of Cardiovascular Ultrasound, Bangladesh Chapter, Bangladesh Society of Geriatric Cardiology. He is the active member of the editorial board of Cardiovascular Journal & Journal of Cardiovascular Interventions. 

He is the first Bangladeshi Physician who has been selected as Professor by the Apollo Hospitals Education and Research Foundation in recognition of his contribution to Research and Academics. 

Before joining in This Hospital, He was Associate Professor of Cardiology in NICVD, Dhaka.

name: Dr. Md. Azharul Islam
specialty: Senior Consultant, Anaesthesia and Pain Medicine
description: Dr. Md. Azharul Islam graduated from Mymensingh in 1984 and did his post graduation (FCPS) in Anaesthesia in 1994. He then worked in the Anaesthesia Department of BSMMU and Bangladesh Medical College in different capacities from Assistant Professor to Consultant. Dr. Azhar also worked as Specialist at Jeddah Maternity & Children Hospital under Ministry of Health, Saudi Arabia, which is a 300-bed Tertiary Care Centre. Before joining Apollo Hospitals Dhaka, he was working as Consultant - Cardiac Anaesthesia and General Anaesthesia in the private sector since November, 2006.

name: Dr. Md. Sadiqul Islam
description: Dr. Md. Sadiqul Islam completed his MBBS and did FCPS in Medicine.Â Afterwards,Â  in January 1995 he didÂ Post-Graduate Fellowship in from BCPS, Dhaka. Since then, he served as Consultant - MedicineÂ at different district hospitalsÂ in Bangladesh. He obtained Post-Graduate Training in Rheumatology from Royal Wolverhampton Hospital, England. Before joining Apollo Hospitals Dhaka, he was serving asÂ Assistant Professor of MedicineÂ at Khulna Medical College for eight years.

name: Dr. M. Ali
specialty: Coordinator & Senior Consultant, Joint Care & Wellness Centre
description:
Dr. M. Ali is the country's most celebrated Knee Surgeon and is renowned as the pioneer of knee
surgery in Bangladesh. He has vast experience in knee replacement and arthroscopic surgery both at
home and abroad.

Dr. M. Ali has been performing authoritative practice for more than a decade in Evercare Joint
Care & Wellness Centre, which is the first and only super specialty centre of its kind in Bangladesh. After
joining Evercare, he has successfully performed more than 20,000 different knee surgeries.

He has unprecedented expertise in total Knee replacement surgery. He has performed more
than 1000 total knee replacement surgeries (both unilateral and simultaneous bilateral) with the highest
success rate in the country with minimum or no complications. Beside knee replacement, he is an expert
on arthroscopic ligament reconstruction (ACL, PCL) and arthroscopic meniscus surgery. He has
successfully performed more than 8,000 arthroscopic knee surgeries & procedures in his centre.

Before joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, Dr. M. Ali worked at the National Institute of
Traumatology and Orthopedic Rehabilitation (NITOR), Prestigious BSMMU and Dhaka Medical College
Hospital. His highly skilled and experienced hands have successfully contributed beyond the country and
performed different complex knee surgeries.

After medical graduation Dr. M. Ali obtained his post-graduation in orthopaedics. Then he was
awarded the highly esteemed fellowship from Singapore General Hospital on arthroscopy and
replacement surgeries. After that, he received comprehensive training in advanced arthroscopic surgery
which was supervised by the Royal College Surgeons of England and Australia. He is trained in computer-
assisted arthroplasty (joint replacement surgery) & robotic knee surgery.

He attended many international conferences as a faculty and presented many research works on
knee surgeries. He has many noticeable international publications with several national publications.
Personally, he is also passionate about orthopaedic rehabilitation of physically disabled children.

name: Prof. (Dr.) Motiur Rahman Molla
educationalDegree: BDS, FCPS (Hons), PhD (OMS-Japan), FDS, RCPS (Glasgow, UK)
specialty: Coordinator & Senior Consultant, Dental & Maxillofacial Surgery
description:
Dr. Molla is the most reputed senior Dental & Maxillofacial Surgeon in Bangladesh. He was the former Chairman of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery and also the Dean of Faculty of Dentistry at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU).

He has multiple publications in the most highly reputed medical journals around the world. 

He is the choice doctor for all dental and oral procedures including oral cancer, dental implants, facial bone trauma/fractures, jaw tumors, and dental reconstruction. 

Obtained his Bachelor of Dental Surgery from Dhaka University. Received his post-graduate diploma in Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery from the world-renowned Osaka University in Japan.

Achieved his FCPS in Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery from BCPS. After which he received specialized training in the field from hospitals in Australia and Canada.

name: Prof. Dr. Raju Titus Chacko
specialty: Senior Consultant- Medical Oncology, Medical Oncology
description:
Prof. Dr. Raju Titus Chacko completed education in medicine from Christian Medical College, Vellore, India.
He has advanced training in Medical Oncology from Royal Adelaide Hospital, South Australia.
Prior to joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, he was Professor and Head of Medical Oncology Services at the Christian Medical College, Vellore, India.
Prof. Dr. Raju Titus Chacko specializes in the comprehensive medical care of patients with cancer, including chemotherapy, molecular targeted and immunotherapies.
Prof. Chacko is a reputed clinical researcher and has been part of more than 30 international clinical trials and has several publications to his credit.
He is a member of several professional societies and organizations like the American Society of Clinical Oncology (ASCO) and European Society of Medical Oncology (ESMO).

name: Prof. Dr. Abdul Mannan Sarker
description:
He is one of the very few specialized Endocrinologists of Bangladesh who covers all areas of Hormone Disorders. 
He obtained MBBS from Chittagong Medical College in 1981, DEM (Diploma in Endocri-nology & Metabolism) in 1992 from BIRDEM Academy under Dhaka University, Md (Endocrinology & Metabolism) in 1996 from BIRDEM Academy under Dhaka University. 
He has served in multiple government medical colleges and hospitals of the country. Before joining here he was working as Associate Professor and Head of the Department of Endocrinology and Diabetology in Sir Salimullah Medical College & Mitford Hospital, Dhaka.


He was recruited by The government of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia where he spent 5 years at world-renowned King Fahad Specialist Hospital as a Consultant Diabetologist and Endocrinologist. 
While in Saudi Arabia, he was also working as Clinical Assistant Professor at the Department of Endocrinology and Diabetology of Qassim University College of Medicine. 
Apart from the management of Diabetes and Thyroid Disorders, he is an expert in management of other hormonal problems such as Growth Disorders (short and tall height), Hirsutism (Unwanted facial and body hair in women), Gynaecomastia (enlarged breasts in male), Obesity and Male & Female Infertility. He has also a lot of experience in reproductive health in managing male and female sexual problems.

name: Dr. Mrinal Kumar Sarker
description:
â¢ He obtained his MBBS from Dhaka University, completed DGO from the same university and obtained FCPS (OBS/GYNAE) from BCPS.Â 
â¢ He has served as a Consultant and Teacher in different Medical College and Hospitals of the country. Furthermore, he worked as a fellow in the Centre for Assisted Reproduction CARE of Singapore General Hospital.Â 
â¢ He also worked as a Fellow in Reproductive Medicine in KKIVF Centre, Singapore. He developed his skill in modern Infertility management and Assisted Reproductive techniques (IVF & related procedures). Other than Infertility management, he has expertise in managing all sorts of Obstetrical and gynecological problems.Â 
â¢ Dr. Mrinal and his world-class team helped many infertile couples to have babies through Assisted Reproductive technology of International Standard.

name: Dr. Lutful L. Chowdhury
description:
â¢ He administered the first capsule endoscopy in Bangladesh.
â¢ He has 33 years of experience as clinician. 
â¢ Dr. Lutful L. Chowdhury obtained his MBBS from Dhaka Medical College. Later, he earned his MRCP degree from the Royal College of Physicians in the UK, and subsequently his FRCP from the Royal College of Physicians, Edinburgh & FCGE from UK. 
â¢ Presently, he is providing comprehensive painless Endoscopy and Colonoscopy services at Evercare Hospital Dhaka, and conducting the Hepatitis, Liver Cirrhosis and Fatty Liver Clinic where patients receive comprehensive management of Hepatitis B & C. 
â¢ He completed his clinical fellowship in Clinical Gastroenterology from Oxford Regional Authority in collaboration with the British Society of Gastroenterology. 
â¢ With extensive training in all modalities of both diagnostic and therapeutic GI Endoscopy (including Gastroscopy, Colonoscopy and ERCP) he had undergone 12 years of training in multiple disciplines of Internal Medicine, Cardiology, Pulmonology and Neurology in the UK. 
â¢ Additionally he is associated with the research of Liver Disease and is a member of the European Association of the Study of Liver Disease (EASL) and the British Society of Gastroenterology (BSG).

name: Dr. Mahmood Hasan
description:
Dr. Mahmood Hasan completed his MBBS in 1981. He started his medical career as a Resident Psychiatrist in 1988, and undertook three and a half yearsâ of full time training. He did FCPS in Psychiatry in 1992 from Institute of Post-Graduate Medical & Research (IPGMR), Dhaka. From 1993, has been working at Bangladesh Medical College & Hospital, Dhaka in different capacities from Assistant Professor, Associate Professor to Professor. He is also a Consultant at Mahila Parishad, a NGO dealing with feminine rights, domestic violence and other legal aspects.
Â Dr. Mahmood Hasan has a number of publications in reputed medical journals, and has attended many international seminars. Some of his works are related to stress in the Indian culture. He has taken several trainings at Delhi and Pune, India. He has good experience in managing psychiatric patients with expertise in counselling, personal disorder, depression, ADHD, stress management, bipolar disorders, schizophrenia, drug addiction disorders, domestic violence and crisis intervention, as well as community psychiatry.

name: Dr. Mrinal Kumar Sarker
description:
â¢ He obtained his MBBS from Dhaka University, completed DGO from the same university and obtained FCPS (OBS/GYNAE) from BCPS.Â 
â¢ He has served as a Consultant and Teacher in different Medical College and Hospitals of the country. Furthermore, he worked as a fellow in the Centre for Assisted Reproduction CARE of Singapore General Hospital.Â 
â¢ He also worked as a Fellow in Reproductive Medicine in KKIVF Centre, Singapore. He developed his skill in modern Infertility management and Assisted Reproductive techniques (IVF & related procedures). Other than Infertility management, he has expertise in managing all sorts of Obstetrical and gynecological problems.Â 
â¢ Dr. Mrinal and his world-class team helped many infertile couples to have babies through Assisted Reproductive technology of International Standard.

name: Dr. Lutful Aziz
specialty: Coordinator & Consultant, Anaesthesia and Pain Medicine
description:
Areas of expertise


		Dr. Lutful Aziz graduated in 1985 from Dhaka Medical College under Dhaka University. In 1990 he went to Okayama
		University Medical School under the Govt. of Japan Scholarship and completed his PhD in Anaesthesia and Pain
		Medicine in 1995. After returning to Bangladesh, he completed his fellowship in Anaesthesia (FCPS) from the
		Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons in 1997. Prior to his joining Apollo Hospital as Consultant, he was
		Associate Professor in Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University and was the Academic Coordinator of the Post
		Graduate Studies of Dept. of Anaesthesia, Analgesia and Intensive Care Medicine.
	

		During his career he has travelled to many countries to attend International Congresses in Anaesthesia, ICU and Pain
		medicine and delivered more than 100 lectures as an Invited Speaker. To his credit he has more than 70 publications
		in different National and International journals. He is in the Editorial Committee of four national and
		International journals. He is the founder member, President and is currently the Immediate Past President of
		Bangladesh Society for Study of Pain.
	

		His areas of expertise are different techniques of modern Anaesthesia like General Anaesthesia, Paediatric
		Anaesthesia and other disciplines of Anaesthesia. He is an expert on Obstetric Anaesthesia and Labour analgesia. His
		special interest is Pain Medicine, dealing with regional blocks for different cancer and chronic pains. He is
		presently working on Ultrasound guided Regional Anaesthesia and Point of Care Ultra Sound (POCUS). He runs a Course
		on USG Regional blocks regularly in the department. He has devoted himself on the Academic improvement in
		Anaesthesia Studies in Bangladesh and is currently working with the Faculty of Anaesthesia of the Bangladesh College
		of Physicians and Surgeons.
	

		He has brought PTC to Bangladesh and organized the first PTC course for trainees and trainers in Dhaka. He is one of
		the trainers in PTC and regularly organizing PTC courses in Bangladesh.
	

		He has recently been awarded the Fellowship (FRCA) by the Royal College of Anaesthesia, England for his outstanding
		contribution to Anaesthesia.

name: Prof. Dr. Kazi Hasinur Rahman
description:
Prof. Dr. Kazi Hasinur Rahman is working as a consultant in General Dentistry in this hospital from February, 2009.  
He completed his BDS (Bachelor of Dental Surgery) from Dhaka Dental College in 1994 and MS in Prosthodontics from BSMMU.  
He is trained in Implant Prosthesis from his home country & abroad.  
He has worked in a good number of reputed institutions for the last 20 years.  


He has also been in the teaching profession for the last 18 years and working as a professor currently.  
As a Prosthodontist, his special expertise is in artificial replacement of missing teeth such as Crown, Bridge, Implant & Maxillofacial Prosthesis.  
He is also expert in high tech endodontic procedures such as Root Canal Treatment & Endo-Surgery.

name: Dr. Md. Sadiqul Islam
description: Dr. Md. Sadiqul Islam completed his MBBS and did FCPS in Medicine. Afterwards, Â in January 1995 he did Post-Graduate Fellowship in from BCPS, Dhaka. Since then, he served as Consultant - Medicine at different district hospitals in Bangladesh. He obtained Post-Graduate Training in Rheumatology from Royal Wolverhampton Hospital, England. Before joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, he was serving as Assistant Professor of Medicine at Khulna Medical College for eight years

name: Dr. M. Quamrul Hassan
description:
The most renowned child health specialist in the country, practising paediatrics for last 25 years.
He obtained his MBBS from Chittagong Medical College; then completed his FCPS in Paediatrics, respectively from the then IPGMR and BCPS.
Before joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, he has contributed a lot to the establishment of the Institute of Child & Mother Health (ICMH), and served there for 11 years as Registrar, Consultant of Paediatrics, and an Assistant Professor.
He has received trainings from home and abroad, including ICH and Hammersmith Hospital of London and Aga Khan University of Karachi. His trainings also include paediatric emergency care and intensive care.
He has made contributions to various national child health programmes. As a trainer, he has developed numerous training modules, coordinated many training programmes and trained many professionals in child health.
He is a researcher in the fields of child health, child nutrition, new-born care and early childhood development, and has been awarded the 2005 Young Researcher Award by BPPF.
He has special interest in paediatric chest diseases, asthma and allergy, paediatric ENT problems, new-born care, early childhood development, child nutrition, paediatric emergency, and intensive care.

name: Dr. Gulshan Ara
educationalDegree: MBBS, MCPS, FCPS, MS (Gynae/Obs)Trained in Advanced Laparoscopic Surgery (India)
specialty: Senior Consultant & Coordinator, Obstetrics and Gynaecology
description:
Dr. Gulshan earned her MBBS from Dhaka University. She obtained MS in Gynecology & Obstetrics from the same institute, and then completed MCPS and FCPS from Bangladesh college of Physicians & Surgeons (BCPS).

She has about 30 years experience in the field of obstetrics and gynaecology. She is trained in advanced laparoscopic Surgery from Kerala and Chennai, India. Throughout her career, she has developed her skills in modern Gynaecology/ Obstetrics and infertility management.
Before joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, Dr. Gulshan Ara was serving as Consultant in the Department of Gynaecology & Obstetrics Dhaka Medical College Hospital for 7 years.

name: Dr. Md. Zulfiqur Haider
specialty: Senior Consultant & Coordinator, Cardiothoracic & Vascular Surgery
description:
â¢ He obtained his MBBS from Sir Salimullah Medical Collage and Mitford Hospital in 1993.Â 
â¢ He obtained MS in Cardio Vascular & Thoracic Surgery from the National Institute of Cardio Vascular Diseases (NICVD), Dhaka in 2002. After which, he served in multiple government institutes. He was also a Consultant in the National Heart Foundation Hospital & Research Institute, Dhaka.
â¢ He is highly skilled and experienced in the treatment of complex coronary artery diseases, aneurysms, valvular heart diseases, and paediatric cardiac cases.Â 
â¢ He has specialized training in Vascular and Thoracic surgeries, having performed over 4000 successful open heart surgeries. He is the choice doctor for Heart Failure Surgery, Minimally Invasive Cardiac Surgery.

name: Prof. (Major Gen.) Dr. Golam Mohiuddin Chowdhury
description:
Maj Gen Mohiuddin is a renowned Oral and Maxillofacial Surgeon of the country. He is one of the pioneer surgeons of Oral Implantology in Bangladesh. He has travelled many countries in connection with official capacities and attended a number of Seminars and Conferences.  

Maj General Golam Mohiuddin Chowdhury has been appointed as Consultant Dental Surgeon General of Directorate General of Medical Service on 31 Jul 2017.  He is the first Major General from Army Dental Corps. 
 
Gen Mohiuddin graduated (BDS) from Dhaka Dental College under Dhaka University in 1982. He was commissioned in Bangladesh Army in Army Dental Corps in 20 Sep 1984. After his commission, he underwent various Training, Course, and Seminar both at home and abroad. He was trained in Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery from Armed Forces Institute of Dentistry, Pakistan in 1993-94.. He got training in Implant Surgery from Singapore in 1999 and advance training from Malaysia and Australia in 2015 and 2017. He also pursued training in TMJ Arthroscopy from Germany in 2014. He got Advanced Implant Training Course from Malaysia in 2016. He also joined various Seminar and Workshop likely Hongkong in 2006, Thailand in 2016, China in 2017 and Thailand in 2019. 


He attended UN Mission, Searalion in 2003. He completed FCPS in OMF Surgery from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons (BCPS) in 2007. Over the years, he has served in various CMHs as senior Oral and Maxillofacial Surgeon. He also served as the first Commandant of MDC Dhaka. Dental service in Army has been developed and Military Dental Centers formed as independent units separating from all CMHs by his initiative and relentless effort.          


He is the choice of doctor for all dental & oral procedures including oral cancer, dental implants, facial trauma/fracture, jaw tumor, TMJ/JAW joint problem and jaw reconstruction.

name: Dr. Mohammed Mohiuddin Araf
specialty: Coordinator & Senior Consultant, Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation
description:
â¢ Obtained his MBBS from India and received his MD from the All India Institute of Medical Services in New Delhi.
â¢ Trained in Advanced Pain Management and Neuro-Rehabilitation from the University of Newcastle in the UK.Â 
â¢ Specialized in treating acute and chronic pain syndromes such as back-pain, neck-pain, shoulder pain and pain form work related injuries.
â¢ He is the choice doctor for Comprehensive Sports Rehabilitation and Neuro-rehabilitation services, especially patients suffering from sports injuries, spinal cord injury, and post stroke rehabilitation.Â 
â¢ He is an expert in Paediatric rehabilitation for children diagnosed with conditions such as cerebral palsy and epilepsy. In addition he provides Botulinum Toxin Injection (Botox) to treat advanced movement disorders.

name: Dr. Sabina Sultana
educationalDegree: MBBS, DCH, MCPS (Paed.), MD (General Paed.), MD (Paed. Nephrology)
description:
Dr. Sabina Sultana graduated from Mymensingh Medical College in 1989. She started her career as a research fellow at ICDDR, B. Two years later, she joined at Dhaka Shishu hospitals.
Â 
She worked under the Ministry of Health in different places at various posts and positions, including in Dhaka Medical College.
Â 
She completed her Diploma in Child health, DCH and MCPS in pediatrics. Later on, she obtained MD in pediatrics from Dhaka University in 2001. Then she joined BSMMU and obtain MD in Pediatric Nephrology in kidney diseases of children.
Â 
She joined Apollo Hospitals Dhaka in 2012. Before that, she had been working at Uttara Adhunik Medical College as an Associate Professor of pediatrics.
Â 
She has vast experience in Neonatology, ie health of newborn babies and ICU management.
Â 
She has more than 25 of publications in National and International journals about Child Health, Neonatal Health, and Child Kidney Diseases.
Â 
In the year 2019, for her outstanding services and contribution to Pediatrics, she has been awarded FRCP, from Royal College of Physicians and Surgeons of Glasgow, UK.
Â 
At present, she has been working as a Senior Consultant of Pediatrics & Neonatology at Evercare Hospital Dhaka

name: Dr. Borhan Uddin Ahmad
description: Areas of expertise  Dr. Borhan Uddin Ahmad obtained his MBBS from Dhaka Medical College. He spent 6 years in the United Kingdom, where he passed the PLAB test and worked in different hospitals under the National Health Service. He started his carrer there as a         junior doctor in Internal Medicine and soon became Registrar in Rotherham General Hospitals, South Yorkshire. He later completed his MRCP (UK) from the Royal College of         Physicians of United Kingdom.      He returned to Bangladesh and joined Bangladesh Medical College and Hospital as an Assisstant Professor of internal Medicine and worked there for 5 years. He was then         recruited by the Kingdom of Saudi-Arabia as a Consultant Physician of Emergency Medicine and worked there for several years before he joined Evercare Hospital Dhaka.

name: Dr. Niaz Ahmed
educationalDegree: MBBS, DA (Diploma in Anaesthesiology), MCPS (Anaesthesiology), FCPS (Anaesthesiology)
description:
Dr. Niaz Ahmed did his MBBS from Sylhet Medical College in 1986 and took his DA (Diploma in Anaesthesiology) from Dhaka University in 1994. After that Dr. Niaz did his MCPS (Anaesthesiology) in 1995 and FCPS (Anaesthesiology) in 2004 from Bangladesh college of Physicians and Surgeons.
He was Associate Professor in Anesthesiology in Dhaka National Medical College Hospital, Dhaka. He has experience in Cardiac Anesthesia and ICU for 8 yrs in Ibrahim Cardiac Hospital & Research Institute. He was actively involved in Anesthesia & ICU management of different types of cardiac surgeries which include CABG (on-pump, off- pump), Valve Replacement, Emergency CABG, Redo CABG, Ventricular Septal Rupture (VSR),Vascular cases, Thoracic cases, Pediatrics cases like ASD, VSD, Tetralogy of Fallot's, Intra cardiac shunt repair and other complex congenital cardiac cases. Total number of cardiac surgical cases done by Dr. Niaz in Ibrahim Cardiac Hospital & Research Institute was an average of 630 no. per year.
Dr. Niaz worked as Anesthesiologist for 12 yrs in General and other Surgical Procedures. He attended seminars and international conferences. He has six numbers of publications in reputed peer reviewed journals.
Before joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, Dr. Niaz worked as Senior Consultant in the Dept. of Cardiac Anesthesiology in Ibrahim Cardiac Hospital & Research Institute, Shahbag, Dhaka.

name: Dr. Sarwar Jahan Bhuiyan
description:
â¢ One of the most highly referred doctor in Paediatric Neurology and only US trained Paediatric Neurologist in the country. 
â¢ Obtained his MBBS from Chittagong Medical College, and FCPS (Paediatrics) and basic Paediatric training from IPGM&R. 
â¢ He received his specialized Paediatric Neurology training at the Los Angeles Children's Hospital. 
â¢ He also received specialized training in Neuroelectrophysiology at the number-one hospital in the world: Cleveland Clinic (USA). 
â¢ He is the choice doctor for children diagnosed with epilepsy, head-aches, Tourette syndrome, neuromuscular disorders, progressive neurological disorders, autism, development disorders and migraine.

name: Dr. Nigar Sultana
description: Dr. Nigar Sultana has joined Evercare Hospital Dhaka as Part Time consultant in the Department of Psychiatry.

name: Dr. Sania Ahsan
description:
Dr. Sania Ahsan graduated from Dhaka Medical College in 1994. She started her career as honorary Medical Officer in Department of Radiology, Dhaka Medical College Hospital in 1996. She worked as Medical Officer in BIRDEM Hospital from 1996 to 2003. After that she completed M. Phil in Radiology and Imaging in 1999 from Dhaka University and FCPS from the College of Physicians and Surgeons, Bangladesh in 2004. In 2003 to 2008 she worked in BSMMU as Assistant Professor and Associate Professor.Â 
She has many publications in different International and National Journals. She has presented research papers in seminars home and abroad. Her original research paper is titled âDevelopment abnormalities of intracranial dural foldsâ She has keen interest in fetal MRI and stroke imaging.
Before joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, Dr. Sania Ahsan worked as a Clinical Fellow of Pediatric Neuroradiology and Neuroradiology in Hospital for Sick Children and Sunnybrook Health Sciences Centre, University of Toronto, Canada from 2010 to 2012

name: Dr. Khandker Mahbubar Rahman
description:
Dr. Khandker Mahbubar Rahman completed his MBBS from Chittagong Medical College. Later on, after finishing Post Graduation training from PG Hospital he joined in the Medicine department of BIRDEM Hospital, Dhaka.
In the 2000 he completed his MD degree on Neurology. Later on, he served as a Registrar of Medicine, Assistant & Associate professor of Neurology in Mymensingh Medical College for about 12 long years.
Before joining to Evercare Hospital Dhaka he worked as Head of Neurology in Mymensingh Medical College and was an examiner of undergraduate and post graduate examination of The University of Dhaka.
From 2016, he is working as a senior consultant of Neurology in Evercare Hospital Dhaka. He has 27 medical publications in some renowned journals.
From 2012, he is working with Apollo Hospitals Dhaka followed by Evercare Hospital Dhaka.

name: Dr. Ajay Abrol
educationalDegree: MBBS, MS (Gen. Surgery), M. Ch. (Plastic Surgery)
specialty: Senior Consultant, Plastic, Reconstructive & Cosmetic Surgery
description:
Obtained his MBBS and MS in General Surgery from the Govt, Medical College and Hospital in Jammu, India.
Received super-speciality training in Plastic & Reconstructive from the Christian Medical College and Hospital in India.
Completed an International fellowship in Hand and Microsurgery at Kleinert and Kutz Hand Institute in Kentucky, USA.
Completed an International Hand fellowship at Woo Hand & Microsurgery Research Clinic, Daegu, South Korea.
He also completed a fellowship in Cosmetic Surgery at the world-renowned Mercy Hospital in Buffalo,USA.
He was also Associate Professor at Christian Medical College, Hospital Ludhiana in India.
He is the plastic Surgeon and Hand Surgeon of choice, and is also the pioneer of Evercare Cosmetic Clihic.

name: Dr. Nikhat Shahla Afsar
description:
Dr. Nikhat Shahla Afsar completed her graduation from Dhaka Medical College in May 1990 and started her career as a clinical fellow of medicine in ICDDR,B. She joined in Government service in 1994 (13th BCS) and served in different health complexes of the country. Later on Dr. Nikhat Shahla Afsar served in Dhaka Medical College as Medical Officer for two years. She served as Assistant Registrar in Department of Medicine of Chittagong Medical College and Hospital for 2 years.
Dr. Nikhat Shahla Afsar completed her MD in Internal Medicine from Dhaka University (IPGMR) in January 2003. She served as Resident Physician and Junior Consultant in Dhaka Mohanagor General Hospital for 3 years on deputation from Ministry of health to Ministry of LGRD. She joined Uttara Adhunik Medical College & Hospital as Assistant professor in June 2007. She has many publications and has presented research papers in many seminars.Â 
Before joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, she was working in Uttara Adhunik Medical College as Associate Professor of Internal Medicine.

name: Dr. A F M Ekramuddaula
specialty: Coordinator & Senior Consultant, ENT & Head Neck Surgery
description:
Obtained his MBBS in 1995 from Sir Salimullah Medical College, Dhaka. After that he joined the Government service & served as an assistant registrar of ENT in Dhaka Medical College Hospital & Rajshahi Medical College Hospital.  
 Obtained his FCPS from Bangladesh College of Physicians & Surgeons (BCPS) and also received his MS in Otolaryngology from BSMMU.  
 After leaving the Govt job he joined as Assistant professor of ENT in BSMMU in 2005 and work there up to December 2010.  
 He conducted 'Vertigo Clinic' during his tenure at BSMMU. 


 He is the doctor of choice for Head-Neck Surgery, Micro Era Surgery, Endoscopic Sinus Surgery (FESS) & Neuro-Otology as he received specialized training in the fields from Australia, Austria, France, India, Singapore & Hong Kong.  
 He took hands on-training on Laser ENT Surgery from Singapore, on Micro-ear surgery from India, on FESS & Advanced FESS with Endoscopic DCR from Adelaide University, Australia & Graz University, Austria, and also on Head-Neck Surgery with Reconstruction Flap Surgeries from Chinese University of Hong Kong.  
 He used most modem ENT equipment (Coblation, Microdebrider, Harmonic Scalpel, Laser & Microscope) in day to day surgeries.

name: Dr. Md. Mizanur Rahman
description:
Dr. Md. Mizanur Rahman Graduated from Sir Salimullah Medical College, Dhaka in 1993, awarded Japanese Government Scholarship (Monbusho) in 1995 for study immunology and earned PhD in Immunology from TohokuUniversity, Sendai, Japan on March 23, 2000.His thesis work was published in international journal "Gene". Just 1 week after PhD Dr. Mizan joined in faculty position as Assistant professor in TohokuUniversityHospital. He got research fellowship from Virginia Commonwealth University, USA and grant from Ministry of Education, Japan. He returned Bangladesh in 2001 and joined in Labaid Diagnostics as "Consultant Immunologist". Along with that, he worked as Assistant professor and Coordinator of School of Health Sciences of State University of Bangladesh.

   He is the introducer of real time PCR technology in Diagnostics in Bangladesh in 2002 while he was consultant in Labaid and established PCR and Genetic lab. Dr. Mizan again got faculty position as Assistant professor in the department of Immunology of Yamagata University, Japan on November 1, 2004 and worked till June 12, 2011. During this time Dr. Mizan showed (by cloning) existence of an isoform of "interleukin-21", a cytokine which has multiple role in innate, adaptive and autoimmunity. Dr. Mizan published many articles in peer reviewed international journals which can be seen in



   http://tinyurl.com/drmizanurrahman

name: Dr. Abu Jafar Mohammed Saleh
specialty: Coordinator & Senior Consultant, Haematology & Stem Cell Transplant
description:
Areas of expertise


Dr. Abu Jafar Mohammed Saleh obtained his MBBS from Sher-e-Bangla Medical College, after which he worked at multiple healthcare institutions including Dhaka Medical College, Sir Salimullah Medical College and Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University. 


He also obtained his FCPS in Haematology from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons (BCPS).


He spent 9 years at the world-renowned King Faisal Specialist Hospital & Research Centre in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, as an Assistant Consultant in the department of Adult Haematology/HSCT. 


He is a specialist in benign and malignant haematology cases and has performed over 1,000 allogeneic and autologous stem cell transplants.

name: Dr. Md. Golam Rubby
description:
â¢ The most promising Orthodontist in Bangladesh.
Â â¢ Completed his Bachelor of Dental Surgery from Dhaka Dental College. Achieved his FCPS in Orthodontics & Dentofacial Orthopedics from BCPS. He is a fellow of World Federation of Orthodontics (WFO).
Â â¢ He has 10 years working experiences in the field of Orthodontia. His speciality is in fixed braces system.
Â â¢ Works as an Associate Professor & Departmental Head of a Private Dental College.
Â â¢ He is the choice of doctor for all dental procedures specially the correction of malaligned,spaced or proclined teeth by braces system & beautification of smile by cosmetic filling.

name: Dr. Amit Kapoor
description:
Dr. Amit Kapoor completed his MBBS from Government Medical College, Amritsar. He obtained DNB in Orthopedics from National Board of Examinations, New Delhi with training at Indian Institute of Orthopedics Research and Accident Surgery, Madurai.
He completed his fellowship at Singapore General Hospital, Singapore. He also received advanced training in Spine Surgery at St. Anna Hospital, GERMANY.
He also has experience of working at Post Graduate Institute of Medical Education and Research and All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), New Delhi.
He specializes in SPINAL PAIN MANAGEMENT. He has special expertise in Endoscopic, Microscopic and Minimally Invasive Spine Surgery. He is expert in dealing with Complex Spine Surgeries, Revision Spine Surgeries, Spinal Deformities, Artificial Disc Replacement and Spinal Tumor Surgeries.
He is an expert in Hip and Knee Replacement Surgeries with association in more than 1,500 Joint Replacement Surgeries. He does Complex Trauma with excellent Surgical results.
Before joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, he was working as a Consultant of Orthopedics, Joint Replacement and Spine Surgeon with a reputed chain of Corporate Hospitals in India.

name: Associate Professor Dr. Ahsanul Haq Amin
description:
Dr. Ahsanul Haq Amin obtained his graduation from Mymensingh Medical College and completed MD in Endocrinology and Metabolism from BIRDEM Academy. Later on, he earned his Fellowship from American Association of Clinical Endocrinology. 
In his career, he worked for different institutions like ICDDRB, Dhaka Medical College, BIRDEM Hospitals etc. He has received advanced training in Endocrine Update from Singapore.

Dr. Ahsanul Haq Amin is an expert on Diabetology, Thyroidology and Hormone related treatments. He was a member of the core committee which developed the "Bangladesh Insulin Guideline (premix) for Type-2 Diabetes Mellitus" formulated by Bangladesh Endocrine Society. 
He was Associate Professor and Head of the Department of Endocrinology at Bangladesh Medical College prior to joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka.

name: Dr. Mohammad Farid Hossain
description:
Obtained his MBBS from Karnataka and MASTER OF SURGERY (MS) from Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER), subcontinent's one of the most premier medical institutes in Chandigarh, India. He underwent extensive training during his student life and gained experience working with various reputed medical institutes in India for around 14 years. He has acquired vast experience in all kinds of General. Laparoscopic and Complicated Digestive tract & organs surgeries. Just before joining Apollo Hospitals Dhaka, he had been working as an Associate Professor & lncharge of Dept. of Emergency, Trauma in Khwaja Yunus Ali Medical College and Hospital, Sirajganj, a well-known institute for cancer treatment.  
His vast knowledge, skill, experience in various discipline of surgery specially Abdominal cancer (gastrointestinal tract-colorectal, liver, pancreas, spleen). Advanced laparoscopy, breast cancer & trauma surgeries made him as one of the choice surgeon of the country. Pioneer - He is country's one of the pioneer in the field of Advanced Laparoscopic Surgery (key hole opening of the abd) like Laparoscopic gangenous/ pus filled & densly adered gall bladder and appendix surgery. Esophageal cancer surgery without opening thorax. Redolongo procedure (2nd time longo procedure in the same patient), Breast Cancer Surgery with very minimum blood loss etc.  

He is the 1st to perform the following in Evercare Hospital Dhaka - Daycare gallbladder excision surgery (Admission operation in the morning and discharge in the evening after feeding). - Latest kind of Breast cancer surgery using gamma probe. Laparoscopic colorectal cancer & non-cancer surgery. - STARR procedure- Excision of large Prolapsed haemorrhoids, prolapsed rectum causing obstructive dification. - Removal of liver stones with the help of flexible scopes. - Uses of Khar suta in the treatment of complex fistula in Ano. - Extraordinary surgeries like pelvic EXENTERATION. (all pelvic organ excision) cytoreductive surgery etc are notable Areas of Interest: - Robotic Surgery- performing Abdominal Surgeries with the help of Robotic arms, Bariatric Surgery - weight reduction Surgery. Laparoscopic Gastrointestinal Cancer, non-Cancer Surgery. - Hepatobiliary, Liver Transplant Surgery.

name: Dr. Fahmida Begum
description:
Dr. Fahmida obtained MBBS from Chattogram University, Bangladesh in 1996 and MD from Sindh Institute of Urology and Transplantation, Pakistan in 2006. 
She has been working as a nephrology consultant at Evercare Hospital for the last 5 years. 
Dr. Fahmida is highly skilled in general & intervention nephrology and has successfully performed all nephrology procedures like kidney biopsy, dialysis catheter insertion including tunnel cath, IPD cath insertion, etc.
Throughout her career, Dr. Fahmida Begum has been directly involved with more than 500 kidney Transplants with extensive experience in post-transplant follow up. 
Dr. Fahmida has more than 20 years of experience of working at renowned institutions of Bangladesh & Pakistan.

name: Dr. Kazi Atiqur Rahman
description:
â¢ He obtained MBBS from SSMC, MD from NICVD, MD from (USA) and MRCP from Royal College of Physicians London. Gold Medalist in MRCP (UK) Exam. 
â¢ He worked more than 10 years in King Salman Heart Center, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, a leading International Cardiac Centre of Saudi Arabia. 
â¢ He worked in renowned health institutions in the country like NICVD, BSMMU, Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital and Rangpur Medical College & Hospital, etc. 
â¢ Performed more than 1,000 cases of Coronary Angioplasty & highly experienced in Transcutaneous Arotic Valve Implantation (TAVI) and Pacemaker Implantation.

name: Dr. Abdullah Al Mamun
description:
He obtained his MBBS from Sher-e-Bangla Medical College, Barisal, and started his professional career as a medical officer. He obtained his Post-graduate fellowship from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons, Dhaka.  
He completed his post-graduate training in Clinical Immunology and Rheumatology from All India Institute of Medical Sciences, New Delhi, India.  

He has long experience in managing Rheumatic Diseases such as Rheumatoid arthritis, SLE, Osteoarthritis, Gout, Ankylosing Spondylitis etc.  
Before joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, he was working as an Associate Professor of Medicine at Khulna Medical College & hospital for 10 years.

name: Professor Lt. Col. (Retd.) Dr. Q.M. Mahabub Ullah
image: Prof. Lt. Col. (Retd.) Dr. Q M Mahabub Ullah.jpg
description: Prof. Lt. Col. (Retd.) Dr. Q M Mahabub Ullah obtained his MBBS from Sher-e-Bangla Medical College and Diploma (DDV), MCPS, and MD (Dermatology and Venereology) from BSMMU Bangladesh. He earned his PGT in Laser Surgery from USA, UAE and Italy. He also obtained FRCP(Glasgow) and MACP(USA). He served in Bangladesh Army for 25 years as a classified specialist in Dermatology and Venereology in various military hospitals. He served in Shahabuddin Medical College, Dhaka for 4 years. He is specialized in managing skin, hair, nail problems, performing skin and nail surgery, cosmetic dermatology and laser surgery. He has wide experience in the management of sexually transmitted diseases and sexual disorder, erectyl dysfunction, premature ejaculation etc. He has special interest in laser surgery (laser hair removal, tattoo removal, laser rejuvenation), skin biopsy, dermatosurgery, electrosurgery, intralesional injection, mesotherapy, dermabrasion, cryotherapy, chemical peeling, hydrofacial, PUVA therapy, dermapen for acne scar, microneedling & radiofrequency, botox, dermafiller, weight reduction by lipolysis, platelet rich plasma (PRP)for hairloss, rejuvenation of face and penile enhancement.

name: Prof. Dr. Hasibur Rahman
description:
Prof. Dr. Hasibur Rahman obtained MBBS from Mymensingh Medical College, Bangladesh and FCPS degree from the Bangladesh college of Physicians and Surgeons. 

He has got training on advanced Dermatology and Venereology from Bangabondhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Dhaka and also received training on therapeutic application of Laser in Dermatology & Dermatosurgery, Cosmatology, Sexual Medine from Delhi, Jaipur, Ahmedabad, Banglore, Lahore, Dubai, China, Korea, Japan, France, Slovakia and Turkey. 

He was also awarded as EADV Visiting Fellow Dermatologist in the Center of Excellence and visited Dermatology & Allergology Institute in Munich, Germany. He also worked as ISD Fellow to different renowned skin hospital in Iran. 

He achieved the MRCPS (Member of Royal College of Physicians & Surgeons) Glasgow, FACP (USA) by the American College of Physicians, International fellow of American Academy of Dermatology, FRCP (Edin) from the Royal College of Edinburg, UK. He has more than 65 research publications in reputed national and international journals. He is also working as Chief Editor of Community Based Medical Journal. 

His expertise includes the management of skin, hair, nail diseases, laser Cosmetology & Cosmetic Dermatosurgery. Also he has been involved in the treatment of sexually transmitted disease and various sexual disorders.

name: Prof. (Dr.) Md. Shahabuddin Talukder
description:
Obtained his MBBS from Rajshahi Medical College. 
He served as a doctor in the Health Service of Iran (named Most Excellent Primary Health System by Unicef). 
Trained in Internal Medicine with specialization in Cardiology from Shaheed Suhrawardi Hospital Dhaka and Dhaka Medical College. There he subsequently obtained his D.Card and FCPS. He received further training in Interventional Cardiology from NICVD and Jeslok Hospital in Mumbai, and specialized training in Intra-Cardiac Device Implementation from Germany. 
With over 21 years of experience in Interventional Cardiology with specialization in Coronary, Angioplasty Carotid and Peripheral Angiogram. He is the choice doctor for complex Chronic Occlusion and Coronary cases.

name: Dr. Tamzeed Ahmed
description:
With over 25 years of experience in the field of Interventional Cardiology, he is one of the most experienced physicians in performing Coronary, Carotid and Peripheral Angiogram and Angioplasty through the radial and femoral method. Additionally, he is highly skilled in Intra-cardiac device implantations.  
Dr. Tamzeed Ahmed Obtained his MBBS from Chattogram Medical College and then he joined the Institute of Post-Graduate Medicine and Research.  
He obtained MRCP from the Royal College of Physicians in the United Kingdom (UK).  
He was trained in Cardiology at renowned Wentworth Hospital under University of Natal, Durban, South Africa.  
He then worked in King Abdul Aziz Cardiac Centre Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, a premier Cardiovascular Institute of the Middle East.  
He was a Fellow of Royal College of Physicians and Surgeons of Glasgow (FRCP) and American College Cardiology (FACC). He was also a Fellow of Society of Cardiac Interventions of USA (FSCAI).  
Before Joining to Evercare Hospital Dhaka (previously known as Apollo Hospitals Dhaka), he worked at Ibrahim Cardiac Hospital & Research Centre Dhaka.

name: Dr. Sohail Ahmed
description:
Obtained his MBBS from Sir Salimullah Medical College in Dhaka. After which he joined Dhaka Medical College for surgical training in multiple disciplines of surgery. There he received his MCPS (Surgery) and MS (Cardiothoracic and Vascular Surgery).  


He is the choice doctor for Minimal Invasive Cardiac Surgery, Heart Valve Repair, and Endoscopic Vein harvesting as he received specialized training from the National University Hospital in Singapore.  


He became an Assistant Professor of Cardiovascular Diseases at the National Institute of Cardiovascular Diseases. After which, he became a Consultant and Assistant Professor in the National Heart Foundation Hospital and Research Institute.  


Worked at renowned hospitals in India including Apollo Hospital Chennai (alongside renowned surgeon Dr. M. R. Girinath), Narayan Hrudayalaya Hospitals.

name: Professor (Dr) M. Istiaque Hossain
description:
Has over 35 years of experience in Paediatrics and Child Health and is pioneer of the Mobile Blood Transfusion System and Breast Milk Bank in Bangladesh.

Obtained his MBBS from Dhaka Medical College. 


He was working in Saudi Arabia where he worked as a Child Specialist for 12 years at the Suleimaniah Children's Hospital and King Salman Biz Abdul Aziz Hospital. 

He received specialized training in Paediatrics at the Royal Hospital for Sick Children in Edinburgh and Glasgow, where he is an elected diplomat in child health. He earned his MRCP from the Royal College of Physicians (London, Edinburgh & Glasgow) and FRCP from the Royal College of Physicians, Edinburgh, UK. He qualified in the Equivalence Examination for Saudi Board / PHD in Paediatrics. 


He began his career at PG Hospital and Institution of Post Graduate Medicine and Research Dhaka and later in life before joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka he was professor and Head of Department of Paediatrics and Neonatology at Holy Family Red Crescent Medical College and Hospital Dhaka.

name: Dr. Sarwar Jahan Bhuiyan
description:
â¢ One of the most highly referred doctor in Paediatric Neurology and only US trained Paediatric Neurologist in the country. 
â¢ Obtained his MBBS from Chittagong Medical College, and FCPS (Paediatrics) and basic Paediatric training from IPGM&R. 
â¢ He received his specialized Paediatric Neurology training at the Los Angeles Children's Hospital. 
â¢ He also received specialized training in Neuroelectrophysiology at the number-one hospital in the world: Cleveland Clinic (USA). 
â¢ He is the choice doctor for children diagnosed with epilepsy, head-aches, Tourette syndrome, neuromuscular disorders, progressive neurological disorders, autism, development disorders and migraine.

name: Dr. M. Quamrul Hassan
description:
â¢ The most renowned child health specialist in the country, practising paediatrics for last 25 years.
â¢ He obtained his MBBS from Chittagong Medical College; then completed his FCPS in Paediatrics, respectively from the then IPGMR and BCPS.Â 
â¢ Before joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, he has contributed a lot to the establishment of the Institute of Child & Mother Health (ICMH), and served there for 11 years as Registrar, Consultant of Paediatrics, and an Assistant Professor.
â¢ He has received trainings from home and abroad, including ICH and Hammersmith Hospital of London and Aga Khan University of Karachi. His trainings also include paediatric emergency care and intensive care.Â 
â¢ He has made contributions to various national child health programmes. As a trainer, he has developed numerous training modules, coordinated many training programmes and trained many professionals in child health. 
â¢ He is a researcher in the fields of child health, child nutrition, new-born care and early childhood development, and has been awarded the 2005 Young Researcher Award by BPPF. â¢ He has special interest in paediatric chest diseases, asthma and allergy, paediatric ENT problems, new-born care, early childhood development, child nutrition, paediatric emergency, and intensive care.

name: Dr. Sabina Sultana
educationalDegree: MBBS, DCH, MCPS (Paed.), MD (General Paed.), MD (Paed. Nephrology)
description:
Dr. Sabina Sultana graduated from Mymensingh Medical College in 1989. She started her career as a research fellow at ICDDR, B. Two years later, she joined at Dhaka Shishu hospitals.
Â 
She worked under the Ministry of Health in different places at various posts and positions, including in Dhaka Medical College.
Â 
She completed her Diploma in Child health, DCH and MCPS in pediatrics. Later on, she obtained MD in pediatrics from Dhaka University in 2001. Then she joined BSMMU and obtain MD in Pediatric Nephrology in kidney diseases of children.
Â 
She joined Apollo Hospitals Dhaka in 2012. Before that, she had been working at Uttara Adhunik Medical College as an Associate Professor of pediatrics.
Â 
She has vast experience in Neonatology, ie health of newborn babies and ICU management.
Â 
She has more than 25 of publications in National and International journals about Child Health, Neonatal Health, and Child Kidney Diseases.
Â 
In the year 2019, for her outstanding services and contribution to Pediatrics, she has been awarded FRCP, from Royal College of Physicians and Surgeons of Glasgow, UK.
Â 
At present, she has been working as a Senior Consultant of Pediatrics & Neonatology at Evercare Hospital Dhaka

name: Dr. Rubaiya Ali
educationalDegree: MBBS, Diploma in Dermatology and Venereology, FCPS (Dermatology and Venereology)
description:
â¢ Obtained her MBBS from Chittagong Medical College and Diploma in Dermatology and Venereology from the Bangladesh Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU). She then completed her Fellowship in Dermatology and Venereology from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons.
â¢ She was an Honorary medical officer at BSMMU. After completing her post-graduation she joined Addin Medical College Hospital and served as an Associate Professor.Â 
â¢ She was a Dermatologist Consultant at the Health Care Development Project (HCDP).
â¢ Her area of expertise includes Chemical Peeling, Botox Injection, Cutaneous & laser surgery from Institute of Dermatology, and received her training in Bangkok, Thailand. Â 
â¢ She is certified and trained in Chemical Peel from the Image Skin Care Institute, in Florida, USA.
â¢ She is trained in Sexual Health & Sexual Medicine under the European Society of Sexual Medicine.

name: Dr. M. Ali
description:
Dr. M. Ali is the country's most celebrated Knee Surgeon and is renowned as the pioneer of knee
surgery in Bangladesh. He has vast experience in knee replacement and arthroscopic surgery both at
home and abroad.

Dr. M. Ali has been performing authoritative practice for more than a decade in Evercare Joint
Care & Wellness Centre, which is the first and only super specialty centre of its kind in Bangladesh. After
joining Evercare, he has successfully performed more than 20,000 different knee surgeries.

He has unprecedented expertise in total Knee replacement surgery. He has performed more
than 1000 total knee replacement surgeries (both unilateral and simultaneous bilateral) with the highest
success rate in the country with minimum or no complications. Beside knee replacement, he is an expert
on arthroscopic ligament reconstruction (ACL, PCL) and arthroscopic meniscus surgery. He has
successfully performed more than 8,000 arthroscopic knee surgeries & procedures in his centre.

Before joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, Dr. M. Ali worked at the National Institute of
Traumatology and Orthopedic Rehabilitation (NITOR), Prestigious BSMMU and Dhaka Medical College
Hospital. His highly skilled and experienced hands have successfully contributed beyond the country and
performed different complex knee surgeries.

After medical graduation Dr. M. Ali obtained his post-graduation in orthopaedics. Then he was
awarded the highly esteemed fellowship from Singapore General Hospital on arthroscopy and
replacement surgeries. After that, he received comprehensive training in advanced arthroscopic surgery
which was supervised by the Royal College Surgeons of England and Australia. He is trained in computer-
assisted arthroplasty (joint replacement surgery) & robotic knee surgery.

He attended many international conferences as a faculty and presented many research works on
knee surgeries. He has many noticeable international publications with several national publications.
Personally, he is also passionate about orthopaedic rehabilitation of physically disabled children.

name: Dr. Farzana Islam
specialty: Specialist and Head, Child Development Centre
description:
Paediatrician specialized in Child and Adolescent Mental health with 15 years of clinical experience in Child Development and Neurology.  
Graduated from Dhaka Medical College in 1990; Diploma in Child Health from (DU) and MCPS in Paediatrics from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons in 2003. Obtained her MSc in Child & Adolescent Mental Health in 2009 from the Institute of Psychiatry, Kings College, London, UK. 

She is an advanced level trainee of Psychotherapy in Certification in Transactional Analysis (TA) and Eye Movement Desensitization and Reprocessing (EMDR). Obtained Diploma in Counselling in TA in 2011. 
Running specialized clinics with Child Psychologist and Child Development Therapist in a multidisciplinary team at CDC- Neurodevelopmental assessment, Psychological assessment, Systematic therapeutic intervention for Autism, ADHD, Cerebral Palsy, Learning disability, Speech, Language and Communication clinic, Behaviour modification and Positive Parenting programs with schools/ institutions and counselling and Psycho-therapy clinics for children, adolescent and their parents.

name: Dr. Md. Aliuzzaman Joarder
description:
Dr. Md. Aliuzzaman Joarder completed his MBBS degree and then he finished MS in Neurosurgery from Bangabandhu Sheik Mujib Medical University and joined Apollo Hospitals Dhaka. Now he is working as a consultant.
He did observership training in Neurosurgery at Mayo Clinic, Rochester, Minnesota, USA in 2011 and in 2013 he was selected for Fellowship in Neurosurgery from NYULMC (Belle Vue Hospital), USA. He completed WFNS-Aesculap Fellowship in Adult Neurosurgery from Germany.
Training on Stereotactic Neurosurgery from Netherland & USA.
He is trained in Neurosurgery from many reputed medical institutions in Bangladesh like BSMMU, Dhaka Medical College.
First ever successful awake brain surgery done by Dr. Aliuzzaman.
He has performed more than 2,000 brain and spine Surgery during his career in Neurosurgery.
He is a member of Bangladesh Society of Neurosurgeons, Bangladesh medical association and Bangladesh Soceity of Spine Surgeons.

name: Dr. Nasrin Zulfiqar
description:
Dr. Nasrin Zulfiqar graduated from Sir Salimullah Medical College in 1993.
She did her DGO in 1997 from BSMMU (former IPGMR) & then completed FCSPS from Bangladesh College of Physicians & Surgeons [BCPS] in 2006.
She has over 19 years of experience in the field of obstetrics & Gynaecology.
Throughout her career, she has developed her skills in modern gynaecology/obstetric management.
She is trained in Colposcopy from BSMMU & trained in laparoscopic surgery from India.
Before joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, She served Goverment service in different Hospitals of the country.

name: Associate Prof. Dr. KBM Hadiuzzaman
description:
He passed MBBS from Mymensingh Medical College in 1993 and completed one-year Internship training from Mymensingh Medical College Hospital in 1994. 
 He worked in International Center for Diarrhoeal Diseases and Research, Bangladesh (ICDDR,B) as Clinical Fellow for two years 1996 to 1997.
 He passed BCS in 1997 and joined in Government service in 1997 and worked in different rural centers for few years.

 He passed MD (Nephrology) from Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical Univer-sity in Jan/2009 and in the same year he joined as Resident Physician (RP) in National Institute of Kidney Diseases and Urology.
 In March/2010 he joined as Assistant Professor in the Department of Nephrolo-gy, Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University and promoted to Associate Professor in May 2015.
 He attended several seminar, scientific sessions and training programs in Saudi Arabia, India, United Arab Emirates, Turkey, Netherland, South Africa, United Kingdom, United States of America and Australia.

name: Dr. Tahera Nazrin
educationalDegree:
MBBS (SSMC), DCH (BICH), FCPS (Paediatrics)
Fellow in Paediatric Cardiology
National University Hospital â Singapore, 
Narayana Hrudayala Hospital (Bangalore, Kolkata, Howrah,Â Jaipur)Â âÂ India
specialty:
Senior Consultant & Coordinator
Clinical and Interventional Paediatric Cardiology, Paediatric Cardiology
description:
Areas of expertise


Dr. Tahera Nazrin is the Founder of Paediatric Cardiology Department in Evercare Hospitals, Bangladesh. She started the department in Evercare Hospital Dhaka in 2016, and subsequently started the department in Evercare Hospital Chattogram in 2021.

Dr. Tahera Nazrin has done Fellowship in Clinical & Interventional Paediatric Cardiology from Narayana Hrudayalaya Hospital, Bangalore, India, Rabindranath Tagore Institute of Cardiac Sciences (RTIICS) Kolkata, India, Narayana Multispecialty Hospital Howrah and Jaipur, India. 

She also obtained fellowship from National University Hospital (NUH), Singapore in Paediatric Cardiology.

She is an expert in the field of Interventional Paediatric Cardiology including device closure of congenital holes in hearts (ASD, VSD & PDA), coil embolization of MAPCAs, temporary pacemaker implantation, balloon pulmonary valvuloplasty (BPV), balloon aortic valvuloplasty (BAV), coarctoplasty, balloon atrial septostomy (BAS), diagnostic catheterization etc. She is highly skilled in 2D, 3D & color doppler echocardiography (TTE, TEE & fetal). She is also skilled in management of preoperative & postoperative children with heart diseases, Kawasaki disease, Marfan syndrome, Rheumatic carditis, patients with arrhythmia, holter monitoring, emergency and ICU care.


She is the pioneer of management of MISC patients in Bangladesh during COVID pandemic period.


Dr. Tahera introduced the low-cost package with free device and balloon for underprivileged children.


Earlier she was the Paediatric Cardiologist at IBN Sina Cardiac Center and thereafter Assistant Professor - Paediatric Cardiology at Ibrahim Cardiac Hospital & Research Institute (ICHRI).


She has many National and International publications. She has been organizing and participating in seminars and workshops in the field of Interventional Paediatric Cardiology since beginning.

name: Prof. ATM Mowladad Chowdhury
description: Areas of expertise           Has long 23 years of surgical career.               Worked in different Medical Colleges and Government Hospitals for 13 years.               He has long academic career with bright reputation for 17 years. He is a Professor of Urology and worked at BIRDEM Hospital and Ibrahim Medical College.               He has experience of performing around 300 live kidney transplantation.               He is skilled and experienced in Urological Cancer Surgery and performed more 3,000 operation.               He is very conversant Laparoscopic and Endoscopic Urological Surgeon and performed more than 7,000 operations.               He has vast experience in Male Urethral Reconstruction of about 1500 cases and Female Urinary Incontinence Surgery in about 200 cases.
